name: VideoToGIF
description: Converts provided MP4 video attachment to GIF.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: This cog converts provided MP4 video attachment to GIF. This cog requires FFMPEG, moviepy (https://github.com/Zulko/moviepy), and imagemagick (Please read this for how to install imagemagick from source <https://github.com/TrustyJAID/Trusty-cogs/tree/master/notsobot>) to work. This cog downloads attachment video which is then saved locally and generates GIF. Processed videos are deleted after uploading. This cog may consume heavy resources rendering videos.
author: siu3334
